item.title: Using tooltips in unexpected ways
item.dc:creator: Joshua Kunst
item.description: Highcharts tooltips are one of most underated features. In the tooltips you can easily render html, that means we can put images, tables even charts. So the possibilities are almost limitless.

item.title: Giving a Thematic Touch to your Interactive Chart
item.dc:creator: Joshua Kunst
item.description: A short description of the post.

item.title: Thematic Interactive Map
item.dc:creator: Joshua Kunst
item.description: Last week all the _rstatsosphere_ see the beautiful swiss map from [Timo Grossenbacher](https://timogrossenbacher.ch) [work](https://timogrossenbacher.ch/2016/12/beautiful-thematic-maps-with-ggplot2-only/) using ggplot2. Now is the turn of highcharter.

item.title: rchess a Chess Package for R
item.dc:creator: Joshua Kunst
item.description: Finally R have a chess package!
